entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:31 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -31.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 04:14 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -31.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -36.0°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
